text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 26 in E-flat major, Op. 81a, also known as Les Adieux ("The Farewell") is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written in 1809 and 1810. Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM. ==Form== The sonata is in three sections, called movements: ==References== Piano Sonata 026 Category:Compositions in E-flat major
title: Piano Sonata No. 26 (Beethoven)
